Key Match Events: Dawid Malan scored an unbeaten 140 off 107 balls
Reece Topley took 4 wickets for 43 runs
Bangladesh were set a target of 365 but failed to reach it, falling to 227 all out
Post-Match Reflections: Dawid Malan expressed pride in the team's performance and his own form
England's win was a significant morale booster ahead of the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh thought Malan should have been given out caught behind but DRS confirmed the on-field decision
Bangladesh were fined 5% of their match fee for being one over behind the required over rate
Bangladesh bowled with only four fielders outside the 30-yard circle to finish England's innings
